name: Growlight
description:
Growlight is DENT Studios entry into the Global Game Jam held in Eindhoven on premises of Eindhoven University of Technology AKA TU/e, February 3rd - February 5th 2023.

Game development by Roman Dotsenko
Game design & visual art by Aleksandar Djordjevic
SFX & Audio by Igor Djordjevic
